welcome: Which class should I play in WoW?
description: Choose your WoW classes yourself and let them compete against each other in a battle. You can select only your favorites, build your own setups, and optionally enter your name. In the end, your new main for Raid, Mythic+, or PvP will be decided.
minTwoClasses: Select at least 2 classes to start the battle!

warrior.name: Warrior
warrior.description: Lots of HP and hard hits.

execute.name: Execute
execute.msg: hits with the thick sword! OVERKILL!

victoryrush.name: Victory Rush
victoryrush.msg: kills an imaginary rat and heals!

judgement.name: Judgement of Light
judgement.msg: judges the target and steals some life.

avengingwrath.name: Avenging Wrath
avengingwrath.msg: gets wings! THE POWER OF LIGHT!

flashoflight.name: Flash of Light
flashoflight.msg: blinds everyone with a bright light and heals.

turtle.name: Aspect of the Turtle
turtle.msg: becomes a turtle. For some reason.

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Glass cannon with high dodge chance.

kidneyshot.name: Kidney Shot
kidneyshot.msg: stuns the target with a nasty kidney shot!

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.msg: steals a health potion and drinks it!

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.msg: disappears into the shadows. Next attack misses!

shield.name: Power Word: Shield
shield.msg: wraps themselves in a glittering sphere.

flashheal.name: Flash Heal
flashheal.msg: prays very quickly for their health.

swdeath.name: Shadow Word: Death
swdeath.msg: whispers something spooky into the target's ear.

deathstrike.name: Death Strike
deathstrike.msg: sucks the life out of the target. Tasty!

deathsadvance.name: Death's Advance
deathsadvance.msg: walks away very slowly, but is immune to everything.

howlingblast.name: Howling Blast
howlingblast.msg: blows the opponent away with bad breath.

army.name: Army of the Dead
army.msg: calls their undead buddies to the party.

healingrain.name: Healing Rain
healingrain.msg: makes it rain in the room. Indoor wellness.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.msg: gets very red in the face and swings wildly!

totem.name: Strength of Earth Totem
totem.msg: places a wooden post on the ground.

polymorph.name: Polymorph
polymorph.msg: turns the target into a sheep. Baa!

chaosbolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaosbolt.msg: fires a green dragon head. BOOM!

healthstone.name: Healthstone
healthstone.msg: eats a green gum and heals.

fear.name: Fear
fear.msg: tells the target about their taxes. Target runs away!

drainlife.name: Drain Life
drainlife.msg: sips on the target like a milkshake.

brew.name: Fortifying Brew
brew.msg: drinks something unidentifiable from a barrel.

kick.name: Blackout Kick
kick.msg: kicks so hard the target sees black.

mist.name: Soothing Mist
mist.msg: blows green steam into the air.

druid.name: Druid
druid.description: Can do everything except sit still.

convoke.name: Convoke the Spirits
convoke.msg: presses all buttons at once! CHAOS!

regrowth.name: Regrowth
regrowth.msg: makes flowers grow on them. Pretty!

demonhunter.name: Demon Hunter
demonhunter.description: Jumps around a lot, looks cool.

eyebeam.name: Eye Beam
eyebeam.msg: stares at the target so hard it burns!

blur.name: Blur
blur.msg: wiggles so fast they can't be hit.

metamorphosis.name: Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.msg: becomes a big, bad demon. ROAR!

disintegrate.name: Disintegrate
disintegrate.msg: beams the target with a blue laser.

blossom.name: Emerald Blossom
blossom.msg: makes a green bud grow from the ground.

deepbreath.name: Deep Breath
deepbreath.msg: flies over once and grills everything.

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.msg: forgot the time and just undoes everything.

seo.title: WoW Midnight Class Picker - Which WoW class do you play?
seo.description: Undecided about WoW class selection for Midnight? Let the WoW Class Picker decide for you!
